summary:
This brings HeadBomb\'s Complete Crafting Overhaul recipes to Lorecraft...
I\'ve modified the requirements of some recipes so that if you find the book, you can craft the object.
descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 3.0+[/url]. 
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=8003]Complete Crafting Overhaul[/url]. 

--
Module for Lorecraft - requires [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft-3.0[/url]+ download to function.

This brings HeadBomb\'s Complete Crafting Overhaul recipes to Lorecraft...
I\'ve modified the requirements of some recipes so that if you find the book, you can craft the object. Some things you will still need to have completed the relevant quest etc... and ALSO found the book.


--
[b]Features:[/b]
Books that add recipes to Lorecraft.
Lorecraft dynamic looting.
Replaces Lorecraft Vanilla and Extras (Mcraft) 

--
[b]Usage:[/b]
The books are the same as from the Lorecraft Vanilla and MCraft- if you already have those books, they will work with these recipes...

--
[b]Install:[/b]
Use NMM or [url=/downloads/file.php?id=1840]Wrye Bash[/url] or extract to your Skyrim/Data folder. 
Install Headbomb\'s [url=/downloads/file.php?id=8003]Complete Crafting Overhaul[/url] (and his [url=/downloads/file.php?id=4719]Weapon Fixes[/url] and [url=/downloads/file.php?id=6047]Perk changes[/url] too)
Install [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 3.0[/url] or newer
For extra tidiness, I also recommend you load ScarabCraftingHacks.esp (in Optional Files) this adds keywords to a few items.

--
[b]Load Order[/b]
If you prefer to use the vanilla recipes for vanilla recipes but want the additional recipes from CCO, then load \"Lorecraft - Vanilla.esp\" after this.

--
[b]Conflicts:[/b]
This mod will conflict with anything that changes vanilla smithing recipes. 

--
[b]Credits:[/b]
ArcaneSmith for Lorecraft
Headbomb for Complete Crafting Overhaul
author: ScarabMonkey and Headbomb
